name: Poly(butyl)acrylate containing no more than 10 weight percent of total polymer units from one or more of the following monomers: methyl methacrylate, methacrylic acid, ethylene glycol dimethacrylate and N-methylolmethacrylamide.
FoodContactSubstance: Poly(butyl)acrylate containing no more than 10 weight percent of total polymer units from one or more of the following monomers: methyl methacrylate, methacrylic acid, ethylene glycol dimethacrylate and N-methylolmethacrylamide.
